response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I estimate its worth to be $10,000 to me. Considering its significance to you, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a price that is slightly above its perceived value by you, ensuring both satisfaction and a fair transaction. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 9500}
